description.narrative: This project aims to enhance the quality of infrastructure sector by empowering communities to participate in overseeing the Quality of infrastructure projects .It intends to promulgate accountability through research, advocacy, communities’ awareness and participation to hold authorities accountable, and increase their participation in monitoring of construction projects, The original goal is to develop a community based monitoring mechanism that communities find both simple and interesting. We reason that communities feel more committed to their development activities if they were empowered to control its monitoring.;
